name: @scramjet/transform-hub
description: A development repo for Scramjet Transform Hub, a container supervisor that allows deployment, execution and monitoring of any application based on a simple interface.

scripts.build:all: yarn build:packages && yarn build:refapps && yarn build:docker
scripts.build:all-packages: LOCAL_PACKAGES=true lerna run build && LOCAL_PACKAGES=true lerna run build:refapps
scripts.pack-one-app: ([ -n "$APPNAME" ] || ( echo 'usage: APPNAME=@scramjet/reference-transform-1-seq yarn pack-one-app' ; exit 1 ) ) && yarn build --scope=$APPNAME && yarn prepack --scope=$APPNAME && yarn packseq --scope=$APPNAME
scripts.pack:pub: yarn clean:root && FLAT_PACKAGES=true MAKE_PUBLIC=true NO_INSTALL=true lerna run prepack
scripts.install:clean: yarn clean && yarn clean:modules && yarn install
scripts.test:bdd-ci-no-host: NO_HOST=true DEVELOPMENT=true SCRAMJET_TEST_LOG=true yarn --cwd=./bdd run test:bdd --format=@cucumber/pretty-formatter --tags=@ci --tags="@starts-host"
scripts.prebump:packages: NEXT_VER=$(npx semver -i ${VERSION_LEVEL:-prerelease} $(jq -r .version < package.json)) && git diff --exit-code --quiet && yarn bump:images && lerna version -y --force-publish --no-git-tag-version ${NEXT_VER} && git add .
scripts.bump:postversion: yarn pack:pub && yarn publish:dist && git push --follow-tags
scripts.update-aaa: node scripts/make-aaa-package.js && rm -rf aaa/node_modules aaa/yarn.lock && ( cd ./aaa && yarn install && npx yarn-upgrade-minor )
scripts.upgrade:all: yarn update-aaa && yarn align && yarn install

author: Scramjet <open-source@scramjet.org>
